pageProduct.name: Avene A-Oxitive Antioxidant Defence Serum 30ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

• Rich in Avène Thermal Spring Water for its soothing and anti-irritating properties
• Ultra-light and refreshing texture, absorbs quickly into the skin
• Skin is visibly brighter, deeply hydrated and glowing • Equivalent to 15% Pure Vitamin C**
• Protects against external aggressors including free radicals, antioxidant properties
• CLINICALLY PROVEN 24H hydration***
• Paraben free
• Formulated to minimise the risk of allergic reaction, non-comedogenic PROVEN EFFICACY 95% skin is brighter after 5 days* 88% fine lines and wrinkles are smoother after 5 days* 92% pores are reduced after 5 days*

 *% of satisfaction - user test on 100 women, serum applied at least once daily for 5 days.
**In-vitro study
***Measurement of the Hydration Index on 19 subjects after 1 application on the forearm

Common Uses

Anti-Aging Serum for tired skin, dull complexion, fine lines and wrinkles, uneven skin texture. For all types of sensitive skin

Ingredients

AVÈNE THERMAL SPRING WATER (AVENE AQUA). GLYCERIN. ISODODECANE. PENTYLENE GLYCOL. WATER (AQUA). DIMETHICONE. ASCORBYL GLUCOSIDE. POLYMETHYL METHACRYLATE. CAPRYLIC/CAPRIC TRIGLYCERIDE. TOCOPHERYL GLUCOSIDE. ARTEMIA EXTRACT. C14-22 ALCOHOLS. CETRIMONIUM BROMIDE. CITRIC ACID. DISODIUM EDTA. FRAGRANCE (PARFUM). HYDROXYETHYL ACRYLATE/SODIUM ACRYLDIMETHYL TAURATE COPOLYMER. POLYSORBATE 60. SODIUM BENZOATE. SODIUM CITRATE. SODIUM HYALURONATE. SODIUM HYDROXIDE. SORBITAN ISOSTEARATE. XANTHAN GUM.

Directions

Apply in the morning and/or evening, after serum, to the face, neck and décolleté.
